trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes and deserializes SOAP methods.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av attributtobjekter som styrer hvordan <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializes og deserializes SOAP-metoder.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Creating a SoapAttributes is part of a process that overrides the default way the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes class instances.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en SoapAttributes er en del av en prosess som overstyrer standard måter den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializes klasseforekomster.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL that has an inaccessible source.
trans-unit.target: Tenk deg at du ønsker å serialisere et objekt som er opprettet fra en DLL-fil som har en utilgjengelig kilde.

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class, you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>klasse, du kan utvide eller på andre måter å styre hvordan objektet serialiseres.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: The members of the SoapAttributes class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmene av klassen SoapAttributes svarer direkte til en gruppe med attributtet klasser som styrer serialisering.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property must be set to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize the property value as an encoded SOAP attribute.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>egenskapen må være satt til en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, slik at du kan overstyre serialisering av et felt eller en egenskap ved å be den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>til å serialisere egenskapsverdien som et kodet SOAP-attributt.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of attributes that control encoded SOAP serialization, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For en fullstendig liste over attributter som kontrollerer kodet SOAP-serialisering, kan du se [attributter som kontrollen kodet SOAP serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more details about adding an instance of the SoapAttributes class to an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om å legge til en forekomst av klassen SoapAttributes til en forekomst av den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>klasse, kan du se den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: For each member or class instance whose serialization is being overridden, you must create a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: Du må opprette en ny <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> for hvert medlem eller klassen forekomsten der serialisering overstyres

trans-unit.source: Set the properties for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> as appropriate to the member or object, then add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>avhengig medlem eller objekt, og deretter legge den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>til en forekomst av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>klassen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> class using the specified custom type.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte egendefinerte typen.

trans-unit.source: Any object that implements the <xref href="System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider"></xref> interface, such as the <xref:System.Type> class.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer den <xref href="System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider"> </xref> grensesnittet, for eksempel <xref:System.Type>klasse.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"></xref> to override.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"> </xref> å overstyre.

trans-unit.source: By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen attributtet brukes i et offentlig felt eller en offentlig skrivetilgang egenskapen som standard serialiseres den som et XML-element.

trans-unit.source: You can also instruct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize a member as an encoded SOAP XML attribute by applying a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> to the field or property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>til å serialisere et medlem som et kodet SOAP-XML-attributt ved å bruke en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>til feltet eller egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> must be created with an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> in order to serialize an object as an encoded SOAP XML stream.) The SoapAttribute property allows you to override the serialization controlled by applying a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> to the member.
trans-unit.target: (Det <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>må være opprettet med en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>for å serialisere et objekt som en kodet SOAP-XML-dataflyt.)</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> Egenskapen SoapAttribute gjør det mulig å overstyre serialisering kontrolleres ved å bruke en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>til medlem.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more details on this process, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om denne prosessen, kan du se den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"></xref> that overrides the behavior of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> when the member is serialized.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"> </xref> som overstyrer virkemåten for den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>når medlemmet serialiseres.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardverdien for en XML-elementet eller attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The default value of a member can be set by applying a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> attribute to the member.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for et medlem kan angis ved å bruke en <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>attributt medlemmet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If the member is being serialized as an encoded SOAP message, you can change the default value by creating a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, setting its <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A> property, and setting the SoapDefaultValue property to the object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis medlemmet som serialiseres som en kodet SOAP-melding, kan du endre standardverdien ved å opprette en ny <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, aktiveres den <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A>egenskapen og setter SoapDefaultValue-egenskapen til objektet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Legge den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>til en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer standardverdien for en XML-elementet eller attributtet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> to override.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"> </xref> å overstyre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> is used to control the serialization of a class member as an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>brukes til å kontrollere serialisering av et medlem med klassen som et XML-element.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SoapElement property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> to override the serialization of a class member as an XML element by creating a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SoapElement til en ny <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>overstyre serialisering av et medlem med klassen som en XML-elementet ved å opprette en ny <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>og tilordne den til egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Then add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Deretter legge den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>til en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, then construct an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>med <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>konstruere et <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>med <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> to override.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"> </xref> å overstyre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a SOAP enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et objekt som angir hvordan <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializes SOAP-nummerering.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> is used to control the serialization of an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>brukes til å kontrollere serialisering av et medlem for opplisting.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SoapEnum property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> to override the serialization of such a member.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SoapEnum til en ny <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>å overstyre serialisering av slikt medlem.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som angir hvordan <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializes et medlem for opplisting.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a public field or property as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializes en offentlig felt eller en egenskap som kodet SOAP-XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er alle offentlige felt og offentlig lese-og skrivetilgang serialisert av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for hvert offentlige eller egenskapen er det vil si fast som et XML-elementet eller XML-attributt i et XML-dokument.

trans-unit.source: To override the default serialization of a field or property, create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and set its SoapIgnore property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre standard serialisering av et felt eller en egenskap, kan du opprette en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, og angi egenskapen SoapIgnore `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the object to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore and the name of the field or property to ignore.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>metode for å legge til objektet i en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>og angi objekttypen som inneholder feltet eller til å ignorere og navnet på feltet eller egenskapen skal ignoreres.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>brukes til et felt eller en egenskap feltet eller egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>

trans-unit.source: However you can override that behavior by creating a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, setting its SoapIgnore property to `false`, and adding it to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property and the name of the field or property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid overstyre denne virkemåten ved å opprette en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, sette egenskapen SoapIgnore til `false`, og legge den til en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, angir objekttypen som inneholder feltet eller egenskapen og navnet på feltet eller egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>må ikke serialisere feltet eller egenskapen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that instructs the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> how to serialize an object type into encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et objekt som angir at det <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>hvordan du serialisere en objekttype i kodet SOAP-XMLEN.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> can be used to control the XML stream generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>Kan brukes til å kontrollere XML-strømmen som er generert av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the SoapType property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> to control the schema for the XML that is generated when a class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IncludeInSchema til en ny <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>til å kontrollere skjemaet for XML-innholdet som genereres når en klasse serialiseres.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref> that either overrides a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref> applied to a class declaration, or is applied to a class declaration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"> </xref> som overstyrer en <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"> </xref> brukes på en klassedeklarasjon eller brukes på en klassedeklarasjon.
